episodes.title: Episode 4.1
episodes.description: Learning of weakened defenses at Bebbanburg due to Scottish attacks, Uhtred plans to seize his birthright, but Edward refuses assistance.

episodes.title: Episode 4.2
episodes.description: Approaching Bebbanburg, Uhtred faces the return of prodigal son Wihtgar with unexpected tricks. News of Cnut's treachery reaches Wessex.

episodes.title: Episode 4.3
episodes.description: Suffering an unbearable loss in the attack on Bebbanburg, Uhtred captures valuable prisoners during the retreat south. Æthelflæd prepares for war.

episodes.title: Episode 4.4
episodes.description: Hoping for Edward's troops, Æthelflæd and Uhtred ally with the Welsh against Cnut's thousand-warrior army in the Battle of Tettenhall.

episodes.title: Episode 4.5
episodes.description: A repentant Æthelred nears death, and his ealdormen vie for control of Mercia. Edward uses his niece Ælfwynn as a bargaining chip.

episodes.title: Episode 4.6
episodes.description: Eardwulf and his men pursue Uhtred's party through a disease-ravaged countryside. Tensions rise between Edward and the Mercians.

episodes.title: Episode 4.7
episodes.description: Ælfwynn suffers from a sweeping sickness. Edward proposes an unexpected path forward for Mercia. Brida is freed by Cnut's kinsman.

episodes.title: Episode 4.8
episodes.description: Uhtred reluctantly prepares to take power in Mercia but secretly formulates an alternate plan. Brida joins the Danes in attacking the Welsh.

episodes.title: Episode 4.9
episodes.description: Danes under Brida and Sigtryggr sack Winchester, guided by traitor Eardwulf. Hæsten ambushes Uhtred's party and seizes valuable captives.

episodes.title: Episode 4.10
episodes.description: Edward besieges Winchester, awaiting Æthelflæd's reinforcements, but Uhtred remains unconvinced that Sigtryggr's ultimate aim is conquest.
